title: Colorado Mountain Dogs
text: Welcome and enjoy our site! Contact our registrar directly for help: Anne Larson, cmdrregistrar1@gmail.com An extraordinary stud dog named Caspian founded our breed in 2009. Our breed is based on this stud, just as the Morgan Horse is based on a single stallion, and many years of careful line-crossing to select traits and protect diversity. The dog above is a Caspian great grand daughter, a perfect CMD, who is 30 inches at the shoulder. Learn more: What Is A Colorado Mountain Dog, What is a Caspian Mountain Dog
